sentences.sentence: What do I mean when I say "big ideas" and "overhauls?"
sentences.translation: 什么是我所说的“新想法”与“大改动”呢？

sentences.sentence: Most changes were in the form of tweaks, instead of major overhauls.
sentences.translation: 大多数变化的形式屏幕，而不是大的检修。

sentences.sentence: Snow Transformation Pack overhauls the Windows interface to look like OS X.
sentences.translation: 白雪转换包对Windows界面进行彻底检修来使它看起来像OS X。
